txt.en: The boar-totem is south-east of Fenmarch.\n\nTova asked if you could find her locket, which she thinks she lost near the boar-totem that she discovered.
Tova is near the western entrance of Fenmarch.\n\nYou were able to find Tova's missing locket near the boar-totem and should now return it to Tova.

'When I returned from my walk, I noticed that my locket was missing. I do not know where it is, but it is likely that it fell off me when I was frightened by that boar-totem.

'If you will be going that way to investigate the totem, could you please be vigilant for my locket? It means very much to me.

'That boar-totem I discovered was south-east of Fenmarch.'
While going for a walk to clear her head, Tova was frightened by a boar-totem that she stumbled upon. When she returned to Fenmarch, she realized that she had lost her locket.
'I thought I had seen this locket for the last time. I am glad that you did not have to look too hard.\n\n'It means much to me...thank you.'
